caption.center: In the Matter of Ray STINSON, Sr., Appellant, v. Rajean BUFFA,

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court of Platte County, James W. Van Amburg, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
William M. Quitmeier, Kansas City, MO, for appellant.
Mark Murphy, Liberty, MO, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before HOWARD, P.J., BRECKENRIDGE and HOLLIGER, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Ray Stinson, Sr. appeals the judgment of the probate court finding that he is totally incapacitated and totally disabled and appointing a guardian and conservator. Because a published opinion wouldPage 729 have no precedential value, a memorandum has been provided to the parties.
The judgment is affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).
